notes.title: Upcoming Events
notes.content: Don't miss our exciting author talk next week! Join us to hear renowned author John Smith discuss his latest book.

notes.title: Recommended Summer Reads
notes.content: Looking for a great book to enjoy during your summer vacation? Check out our curated list of recommended summer reads.

notes.title: Library Closure Notice
notes.content: Please note that the library will be closed for renovations from July 10th to July 15th. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
